content.question: Consider the call  puzzle(3),  which appears in a method in the same class as  puzzle.  What value, if any, is returned as a result of the call  puzzle(3)?

choices.label: Nothing is returned because a  Double  value cannot be returned from a method with return type  double.

skill.text: 3.C: Determine the result or output based on code that contains procedural abstractions.
